title: France panorama. [No. 68/06]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items: 1. Le rallye de Monte Carlo - brief description and footage of the 37th Monte Carlo rally. Brief glimpse of Princess Grace Kelly and family. 2. Paul Claudel - brief biographical details of career diplomat Paul Claudel who combined his job as Ambassador to US and Vatican City with his work as playwright, poet, philosopher. 3. La danse - footage of Grand Classical Ballet of France returning to Paris from tour. 4. La mode - footage and description of spring/summer 1968 collection from fashion designer, Ted Lapidus. 5. Des skieurs belle epoque - traces the history of skiing through to its accept in 1936 as a winter olympics sport.
